EmailTemplate.name: Webinar - Agile Series #2 - US - 2014.08.26.Email - Miss You
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you at our webinar: “Agile Testing – Toto, We’re Not in Kansas – One Company’s Journey to Quality”
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Agile Webinar Series: Moving from Chaos to Quality
Hi {{lead.First Name}},
We’re sorry we missed you at our webinar, “Agile Testing – Toto, We’re Not in Kansas – One Company’s Journey to Quality.” Megan Maloney, QA Manager, IT Solution Delivery at CFA Institute, discusses how her testing organization was able to move from chaos to quality in less than a year using Tricentis Tosca Testsuite. Questions from the audience provided further insight and made for a very interesting hour. Join us for the final webinar in our series:
Agile Testing Webinar #3 September 9, 2014 10:00 a.m. – 11:00 a.m. PDT (1:00 p.m. – 2:00 p.m. EDT) Automate Agile Testing with Tricentis Tosca Testsuite With Roman Zednik, Tricentis
Click here <http://innovate.tricentis.com/webinar-agile-series-3-us-2014-09-09.html?utm_medium=email&utm_source=internal> to register for Webinar #3.
Want to see what you missed? Watch the recording here <http://www.tricentis.com/resources/webcasts>. Thanks, The Tricentis Webinar Team
Megan Maloney QA Manager, IT Solution Delivery CFA Institute
Michael Eckhoff Senior VP of Worldwide Sales Tricentis
